sentences.sContent: Azoth is often associated with the alchemical principle of coagulation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Azoth is often associated with the alchemical principle of coagulation.
sentences.sCn: 水银通常与炼金术中的凝结原理有关。

sentences.sContent: In the project produces oily dirt, dirt and fuel, chromic acid, lime etc scrap, decomposition leather coagulation fat.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the project produces oily dirt, dirt and fuel, chromic acid, lime etc scrap, decomposition leather coagulation fat.
sentences.sCn: 工程中产生的油垢，污垢，以及燃料、铬酸、石灰等残余物，分解皮革的凝固油脂。

sentences.sContent: According to the system characterization, the executing proposal of the frequency controlling technique applied to coagulation pumps is presented.
sentences.sContent_eng: According to the system characterization, the executing proposal of the frequency controlling technique applied to coagulation pumps is presented.
sentences.sCn: 根据该系统运行特性，提出变频调速控制技术在凝结水泵上应用的实施方案。
